rukus.text: Do not think [Prophet] that God is unaware of what the unjust do; He only gives them respite until the Day when eyes will stare in horror
They run around confusedly, with their heads up, unable to look away, their hearts a gaping void

Warn people of the Day when this suffering may befall them, and when the unjust will say, "Our Lord, grant us respite for a little more time, so that we might respond to Your call and follow the Messengers." [God will say,] "Did you not swear in the past that your power would have no end
You have lived in the same places as those who wronged themselves, and it had become clear to you how We dealt with them and We gave you many examples
They planned their schemes, but God was aware of their scheming, even when their schemes were such as to make mountains vanish
Do not ever think that God will fail to fulfill His promise to His Messengers. God is Almighty, Exactor of Revenge
[It will be fulfilled] on the Day when the earth is changed to other than the earth, and the heavens too, and they all appear before God, the One, the All-Conquering
For on that Day, you will see all those who force others to reject God's messages linked together in chains
clothed in garments of tar, with fire veiling their faces
[All will be judged on that Day], so that God may reward every soul for what it earned: God is swift in His reckoning
This is a message to all people, so that they will be warned, and so they will know that He is One God. Let those of understanding be reminded
